reason.short: Date they arrive at the North Pole

movie.title: The Thing from Another World
movie.plot: Scientists at an Arctic research station discover a spacecraft buried in the ice. Upon closer examination, they discover the frozen pilot. All hell breaks loose when they take him back to their station and he is accidentally thawed out!
